events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th at a busy intersection involving their car and a delivery truck.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the collision and the vehicles involved.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the case and is preparing to contact the customer for further details.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the process will start soon.
Requested police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and witness statements to support the investigation of the accident.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and multiple photos showing the extent of vehicle damage.
An investigation team began reviewing the submitted documents and gathering additional information from involved parties.
Investigation concluded confirming liability and damage scope; the accident report and evidences support the claim fully.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the full cost of repairs and rental car reimbursement during the repair period.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciation for the timely communication.
The claim was officially approved by the claims manager following customer's acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued directly to the customerâ€™s bank account today.
The claim case was closed after confirmation of payment receipt and repair completion confirmation by the customer.
All case files, documents, and communications were archived securely for future reference as per company policies.
